import {useContext} from "react"; import AppContext from "../AppContext"; import {BasketItem} from "./BasketItem"; export function Basket({showBasket, setShowBasket}){ const {basket} = useContext(AppContext) return
setShowBasket(!showBasket)}> Ջնջել բոլորը
{basket.map(el=>)}
Ընդամենը էթե
}
